title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: A responsive website to showcase my projects and skills.
challenge: Creating a visually appealing and mobile-friendly portfolio that highlights all my work and skills.
solution: Designed a clean UI with responsive layouts using CSS Grid and Flexbox, and optimized images for fast loading.

title: E-commerce Store
description: A full-featured e-commerce platform with shopping cart and payment integration.
challenge: Implementing secure payments and managing product inventory.
solution: Integrated Stripe for payments and used MongoDB for inventory management.

title: Blog Platform
description: A modern blog platform with markdown support and user authentication.
challenge: Allowing users to write posts in markdown and manage their accounts securely.
solution: Used Next.js for SSR, integrated Auth0 for authentication, and a markdown editor.

title: Weather App
description: A weather forecasting app with real-time data and location search.
challenge: Fetching and displaying real-time weather data for any location.
solution: Used OpenWeatherMap API and implemented search with autocomplete.

title: Task Manager
description: A productivity app to manage daily tasks and deadlines.
challenge: Building a real-time sync feature for tasks across devices.
solution: Implemented Firebase for real-time database and authentication.

title: Chat Application
description: A real-time chat app with group and private messaging.
challenge: Ensuring low-latency messaging and user presence.
solution: Used Socket.io for real-time communication and Redis for session management.

title: Recipe Finder
description: An app to search and save recipes based on ingredients.
challenge: Filtering recipes efficiently and providing nutritional info.
solution: Integrated Spoonacular API and built advanced filtering.

title: Expense Tracker
description: A web app to track expenses and visualize spending habits.
challenge: Visualizing data in an intuitive and interactive way.
solution: Used Chart.js for dynamic charts and local storage for persistence.

title: URL Shortener
description: A service to shorten URLs and track click analytics.
challenge: Generating unique short URLs and tracking usage.
solution: Built a REST API with Express and used MongoDB for storage.

title: Fitness Tracker
description: A mobile-friendly app to log workouts and monitor progress.
challenge: Allowing users to track workouts and visualize progress.
solution: Implemented PWA features and used local storage for offline access.
